title: Does Stray Kids have any ballads? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a fellow ballad lover, I have to confirm…They do not :( As you know, they have a rather intense and experimental discography, so ballads wouldn’t always fit. But, they do have some songs that are more calm or chill. 19I know that this song has some intense raps (we love Hyunjin and 3RACHA~) but it does have a pretty chill beat to it. It’s also really melancholic and slow (sometimes), so it make give you what you’re looking for.GLOWThe same can be same about this one, but it’s a little different. This song would fall under the category of “melodic rap”, so the raps have more smooth grooviness to it (if that makes sense); this song is pretty chill, too.Mixtape #2This song is consists of mainly acoustic guitar, so it’s more soothing and calm than most of Stray Kids’ songs. It’s also really sweet, so while it’s not a ballad, it can give the same type of feeling while you listen to it.Hero’s SoupThis definitely isn’t a ballad, but I’m mentioning it because it’s chill like 19, especially during the chorus. It’s also really sweet song, so it can make you feel calm and happy.That’s all I’ve got for you, but I do have a few artists that make ballads, so you might like them. Seventeen247Adore U (Vocal Team ver.)Don’t Listen in SecretFalling for UHabitHugPinwheelSay YesSecond Life (?—It’s a little more upbeat, so I’m not sure)SimpleSmile FlowerWhen I Grow UpEdenAgainGood NightHappy New Year My Lover (jazz~)I’m StillI’m YoursKilling Me SlowlyRegretRose (kinda jazzy, but it’s pretty good)Shall I StayJi Jin Seok (literally all his current music; he’s pretty new. My favorite is “Good Night”)LoonaAround YouFairy TaleFrozenLet Me In (it’s more orchestral, but it’s great)One WayRain 51db (80’s style)Sonatine
Ballads in the traditional sense, no they don’t however they have slower songs. Try these:
